NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary Flying PassDoor DetectIllusion

Item.LongDescription: A pit for sacrifices is in front of the altar.

ExtraDescription.Description: This is where you put money and items to help Doz expand this shrine and convert more people to the belief of Mota, lord of the gods.

Item.Name: bread
Item.LongDescription: A loaf of bread is here. It doesn't look too stale.

Item.LongDescription: A brass key has been left here.

Item.LongDescription: A long sword has been left here.

Item.Name: hand cuffs
Item.LongDescription: A pair of hand cuffs has been left here.

Item.Name: desk drawer
Item.LongDescription: A desk is set against the western wall.

ExtraDescription.Description: You notice a keyhole in the drawer.
The desk looks very sparse, there is a drawer on the left side.

Item.Name: safe
Item.LongDescription: A safe is placed in a dark corner of the room.

ExtraDescription.Description: The safe is very heavy.

Item.Name: silver coins
Item.LongDescription: A lot of silver is here.

ExtraDescription.Description: Looks like at least a thousand coins.

Item.Name: city key
Item.LongDescription: The very big City Key is lying here.

ExtraDescription.Description: It is probably the biggest key you have seen in your life. It is made from polished gold and has various patterns on it along with the Midgaard Coat of Arms.

Item.Name: bench
Item.LongDescription: A white-painted wooden bench is standing here.

ExtraDescription.Description: It is a quite heavy but very comfortable bench. It is placed with its front towards the river so you can sit and watch the river and the houses on the other side.

Item.Name: fountain water
Item.LongDescription: A small white fountain gushes forth here.

ExtraDescription.Description: It is very nice. Made from fine white marble.

Item.Name: coins
Item.LongDescription: A small pile of coins lies here.

Item.Name: key steel
Item.LongDescription: A large steel key has been left here.

ExtraDescription.Description: A key of this size must fit a very strong lock.

Item.Name: skin water buffalo
Item.LongDescription: A bloated dead buffalo is on the floor.

Item.Name: letter resignation
Item.LongDescription: The receptionist's letter of resignation is taped to the wall.

ExtraDescription.Description: The letter is written in a bold and feminine Carolinian hand. To whom it may concern, Merc Industries has installed a new no-rent save and quit system. Apparently one can now save and quit at any time from anywhere inside a town or out. My services here are no longer required. Diana the Receptionist

Item.Name: notice liquidation bank
Item.LongDescription: The bank's notice of liquidation is taped to the wall.

ExtraDescription.Description: The letter is written in a reserved and dignified Spencer hand. To whom it may concern, Merc Industries has charmed your money. Apparently one's gold will remain close, even beyond death. We are closing down our offices and ATM machines. Our services here are no longer required. Midgaard City Bank

Item.Name: coffee cup cinnamon
Item.LongDescription: A piping hot cup of cinnamon coffee is here.

ExtraDescription.Description: It's a nice flavorful blend, just right for late-night mudding sessions.

Item.Name: soup bowl
Item.ShortDescription: a bowl of chicken noodle soup
Item.LongDescription: A nice hot bowl of chicken noodle soup is here.

ExtraDescription.Description: This looks like just the thing for a cold!

Item.Name: bowl beef stew
Item.LongDescription: A bowl of nice thick beef stew, with lots of vegetables, steams here.

ExtraDescription.Description: This is Kate's special stew, guaranteed to keep hunger pangs away for many hours. Care for a bite?

Item.Name: biscuit
Item.LongDescription: A yummy biscuit, covered with butter, is here.

ExtraDescription.Description: A nice, soft biscuit with just enough butter. Better buy two.

Item.Name: beer bottle killian irish red
Item.ShortDescription: a bottle of George Killian's Irish Red
Item.LongDescription: A dark-tinted bottle of beer is here.

ExtraDescription.Description: It's a fine beer for serious drinkers, complete with the famous horse head logo. Worth every penny.

Item.Name: key white
Item.LongDescription: A white key has been left here.

Item.Name: map midgaard

Item.Name: tome infinity
Item.LongDescription: A tome embossed with the symbol of Infinity hovers here.

ExtraDescription.Description: Those who follow Deomanix are known as the Seekers of Infinity. Deomanix is magic, he created it, and is one with it. There can be no Magic without him. Magic is outside of time, only when wielded by mortals are limitations put upon it. Followers who seek the mark of Infintate Tome know that it is only by the feeble mind of most mortals that magic finds its limits. They seek to free thier mind andgather as much knowledge as possible so they may know the true power availible to them. Deomanix is also the Lord of the Tower of the Five Magics, he therefore holds to the ideals of the Tower as well.
